effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_pred: Grants increased speed, swim speed and damage in water or in rain.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.incapacitate: The player is unable to move their head, as well as having slowed movement.
effect.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_gnaw: The amount of time an Abyssal Gnawer remains in the world.
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.void_beam.gui: Cast an abyssal beam at your chosen target
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.void_rune.gui: Cast void rune at your chosen target
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_slash: Slash your at your target dealing melee damage
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_blast: Unleash a devastating blast that damages blocks and inflicts abyssal burn
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyssal_preda: Cast a spell that increases your swim speed, attack damage, and attack speed. You gain more damage while underwater
Summon various depth charge mines in a radius around you
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.conjure_abyss: Summon a school of Abyssal Gnawers from another dimension to your aid
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.tidal_grab.gu: Cast a tentacle from your grasp to damage targets
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.infernal_stri: Shoot out a minature Incinerator to damage your targets and inflict Blazing Brand on them
Summon flame strikes in a straight line in front of the caster
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.conjure_ignit: Conjure Ignited Revenants and Berserkers to your aid
Spew ashen breath on your opponents
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.bone_storm.gu: Launch a swirling bone storm from yourself. The higher the speed, the farther the spread
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.piercing_bone: Launch a blazing bone at your opponent, and afterwards a small burts of 3 bones spread from you
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.hellish_blade: Summon a replicate of the Incinerator above your opponent, striking them and applying stun and Blazing Brand on hit
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.abyss_firebal: Summon a torrent of bouncing fireballs that change depending on your health, dealing Blazing Brand on hit
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.amethyst_punc: Launch an amethyst cluster at your opponent
spell.cataclysm_spellbooks.gravity_storm: Conjure a void vortex where you are looking to devastate targets
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.void_beam: Summon an abyssal beam similar to the Deepling warlocks
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.void_rune: Summon an void rune at your target's location
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.dimensional_rift: Summon a dimensional rift that lasts for %d seconds
ui.cataclsym_spellboks.incinerator_damag: Deals %d if Incinerator is held in the main hand
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.fireball_details: Below half health turns the firball into soul fire, at below 30% health into an abyss fireball
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.recast_count: Can cast this spell %d times in succession before cooldown
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.amethyst_speed: Launches Amethyst Clusters at %d projectile speed
ui.cataclysm_spellbooks.gravity_storm.li: Summon a void vortex that lasts for %d seconds
death.attack.blazing_aoe.item: %1$s was immolated in %2$s's blazing field while using %3$s
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.hellis: %1$s was gored by %2$s's hellish blade using %3$s
death.attack.cataclysm_spellbooks.infern: %1$s was pierced by %2$s's infernal blade using %3$s
